name: Choose your shoes!
description:
"Choose your shoes!" is a game, where you need to put yourself in someone else's shoes and answer some yes/no questions. You can switch between two characters by clicking on their shoes. To answer a question as 'yes' swipe right, as 'no' swipe left.

 If you guess right, the label changes color to green, if not, to red. You can also use the toggles as notes to help yourself remember about the characters' personalities.

The empathy you achieve at the end of the game is calculated according to my and my partners' answers, relatively how hard was to answer the question - yes, the shoes are also ours respectively :) Therefore, if you guess wrong something that was so easy/obvious for them to answer you lose more points. In the same way, if you guess right something not to decide for them, you gain more points.

It is develop mainly for mobile, but you can try also in the browser and Windows.
